content: मेरुः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a fabulous mountain (round which all the planets are said to revolve; and which forms the centre of the several Dvīpas; <ab>cf.</ab> द्वीप; it is also said to consist of gold and gems); विभज्य मेरुर्न यदर्थिसात् कृतः <ls>N. 1. 16</ls>; स्वात्मन्येव समाप्तहेममहिमा मेरुर्न मे रोचते <ls>Bh. 3. 150.</ls> {@--2@} The central bead in a rosary. {@--3@} The central gem of a necklace.
